title: Saying Eid Mubarak to those who didn't fast or to a Non Muslim? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Abu Yussef from Saudi Arabia had two questions he's saying what is the ruling on bleating on aid a person who did not fast Ramadan and he did not have any legitimate reason so he's sinful and we acknowledge this so is it permissible for us to say read Mubarak or happy read - yes you can even say Eid Mubarak - a kafir in on Muslim because this is a greeting it has nothing to do whether he fasted or not
